00065 template<class InputIterator, typename _CharT, typename _Traits> std::basic_ostream<_CharT, _Traits> &
00066 write_list( InputIterator start, InputIterator end,
00067             std::basic_ostream<_CharT, _Traits> &o,
00068             const std::string delim = ",",
00069             const std::string prefix = "{", const std::string suffix = "}" )
00070 {
00071     o << prefix;
00072 
00073     if ( start != end ) {
00074         o << *start;
00075         start++;
00076     }
00077 
00078     for ( InputIterator i = start; i != end; i++ )
00079         o << delim << *i;
00080 
00081     o << suffix;
00082     return o;
00083 }
00084 
00085 // specialization to print char-list as number lists, not strings
00086 //@todo check if this works for VC
00087 template<typename _CharT, typename _Traits> std::basic_ostream<_CharT, _Traits> &
00088 write_list( const unsigned char *start, const unsigned char *end,
00089             std::basic_ostream<_CharT, _Traits> &o,
00090             const std::string delim = ",",
00091             const std::string prefix = "{", const std::string suffix = "}" )
00092 {
00093     o << prefix;
00094 
00095     if ( start != end ) {
00096         o << ( unsigned short )*start;
00097         start++;
00098     }
00099 
00100     for ( const unsigned char *i = start; i != end; i++ )
00101         o << delim << ( unsigned short )*i;
00102 
00103     o << suffix;
00104     return o;
00105 }

00108 template<class InputIterator> std::string list2string(
00109     InputIterator start, InputIterator end,
00110     const std::string delim = ",",
00111     const std::string prefix = "{", const std::string suffix = "}" )
00112 {
00113     std::ostringstream ret;
00114     write_list( start, end, ret, delim, prefix, suffix );
00115     return ret.str();
00116 }
00118 template<typename T, typename InputIterator> std::list<T> list2list( InputIterator start, InputIterator end )
00119 {
00120     std::list<T> ret;
00121 
00122     for ( ; start != end; start++ )
00123         ret.push_back( boost::lexical_cast<T>( *start ) );
00124 
00125     return ret;
00126 }

00140 template<typename TARGET> std::list<TARGET> string2list(
00141     std::string source, const boost::regex &separator,
00142     boost::regex prefix, boost::regex postfix )
00143 {
00144     std::list<TARGET> ret;
00145     assert( ! separator.empty() );
00146 
00147     if ( ! prefix.empty() ) {
00148         if ( prefix.str()[0] != '^' )
00149             prefix = boost::regex( std::string( "^" ) + prefix.str(), prefix.flags() );
00150 
00151         source = boost::regex_replace( source, prefix, "", boost::format_first_only | boost::match_default );
00152     }
00153 
00154     if ( ! postfix.empty() ) {
00155         if ( postfix.str()[postfix.size()-1] != '$' )
00156             postfix = boost::regex( postfix.str() + "$", postfix.flags() );
00157 
00158         source = boost::regex_replace( source, postfix, "", boost::format_first_only | boost::match_default );
00159     }
00160 
00161     boost::sregex_token_iterator i = boost::make_regex_token_iterator( source, separator, -1 );
00162     const boost::sregex_token_iterator token_end;
00163 
00164     while ( i != token_end ) {
00165         ret.push_back( boost::lexical_cast<TARGET>( ( i++ )->str() ) );
00166     }
00167 
00168     return ret;
00169 }
00179 template<typename TARGET> std::list<TARGET> string2list(
00180     std::string source,
00181     const boost::regex separator = boost::regex( "[[:space:]]" ) )
00182 {
00183     return string2list<TARGET>( source, separator, separator, separator );
00184 }

00198 //@todo test
00199 template<typename TARGET, typename charT, typename traits> std::list<TARGET>
00200 string2list( const std::basic_string<charT, traits> &source,  charT separator )
00201 {
00202     std::list<TARGET> ret;
00203 
00204     for (
00205         size_t next = source.find_first_not_of( separator );
00206         next != std::string::npos;
00207         next = source.find_first_not_of( separator, next )
00208     ) {
00209         const size_t start = next;
00210         next = source.find( separator, start );
00211         ret.push_back( boost::lexical_cast<TARGET>( source.substr( start, next - start ) ) );
00212     }
00213 
00214     return ret;
00215 }

00229 template<typename ForwardIterator, typename T, typename CMP> bool
00230 continousFind( ForwardIterator &current, const ForwardIterator end, const T &compare, CMP compOp )
00231 {
00232     //find the first iterator which is does not compare less
00233     current = std::lower_bound( current, end, compare, compOp );
00234 
00235     if ( current == end //if we're at the end
00236          || compOp( compare, *current ) //or compare is less than that iterator
00237        )
00238         return false;//we didn't find a match
00239     else
00240         return true;//not(current <> compare) makes compare == current
00241 }
00242 
00252 template<typename T> bool fuzzyEqual( T a, T b, unsigned short boost = 1 )
00253 {
00254     BOOST_MPL_ASSERT( ( boost::is_float<T> ) );
00255     const T epsilon = std::numeric_limits<T>::epsilon();
00256 
00257     if ( a == b )
00258         return true;
00259 
00260     if( a < 0 && b > 0 ) {
00261         b += -a;
00262         a = 0;
00263     } else if( a > 0 && b < 0 ) {
00264         a += -b;
00265         b = 0;
00266     }
00267 
00268     if( a == 0 && std::fabs( b ) < epsilon * boost )
00269         return true;
00270 
00271     if( b == 0 && std::fabs( a ) < epsilon * boost )
00272         return true;
00273 
00274     const T dist_fac = ( std::max( a, b ) / std::min( a, b ) ) - 1;
00275     return  dist_fac <= epsilon * boost;
00276 }

00292 template<typename ForwardIterator, typename T> bool
00293 continousFind( ForwardIterator &current, const ForwardIterator end, const T &compare )
00294 {
00295     return continousFind( current, end, compare, std::less<T>() );
00296 }

00346 template<typename charT, typename _Key, typename _Tp, typename _Compare, typename _Alloc >
00347 basic_ostream<charT, std::char_traits<charT> >& operator<<( basic_ostream<charT, std::char_traits<charT> > &out, const map<_Key, _Tp, _Compare, _Alloc>& s )
00348 {
00349     isis::util::write_list( s.begin(), s.end(), out, "\n", "", "" );
00350     return out;
00351 }
00352 
00354 template<typename charT, typename _Tp, typename _Compare, typename _Alloc >
00355 basic_ostream<charT, std::char_traits<charT> >& operator<<( basic_ostream<charT, std::char_traits<charT> > &out, const map<std::string, _Tp, _Compare, _Alloc>& s )
00356 {
00357     size_t key_len = 0;
00358     typedef typename map<std::string, _Tp, _Compare, _Alloc>::const_iterator m_iterator;
00359 
00360     for ( m_iterator i = s.begin(); i != s.end(); i++ )
00361         if ( key_len < i->first.length() )
00362             key_len = i->first.length();
00363 
00364     for ( m_iterator i = s.begin(); i != s.end(); ) {
00365         out << make_pair( i->first + std::string( key_len - i->first.length(), ' ' ), i->second );
00366 
00367         if ( ++i != s.end() )
00368             out << std::endl;
00369     }
00370 
00371     return out;
00372 }
